titleStmt.title: Miracle of Mary: St Mary saves two travellers from floods and soldiers

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

abstract.p: A young, devout man is sent together with a companion by his father to another city during the rainy season. As they are surrounded by the flood, he prays to God and St Mary to deliver them. Miraculously, they find no rain anymore. They arrive at the city they were sent to, and, on their return, see many soldiers. Again, the young man prays for deliverance, and in the very last moment, the soldier, who is about to rob them, repents and goes on his way without damaging them.
